locked_doctrines.title: The Entropy Paradox (Flexibility Veto)
locked_doctrines.rationale: High-entropy tethers facilitate manifold collapse. Generator optimizes contact density at the expense of Pauli exclusion. Scope Note: Does not apply to intrinsically disordered regions outside steric shelf interfaces.

locked_doctrines.title: Needle Manifold Satiation
locked_doctrines.rationale: Multi-point aromatic barbs trigger steric collapse (2.11 Å). Manifold has reached its geometric efficiency limit.

locked_doctrines.title: Beta-Hairpin Topology Incompatibility
locked_doctrines.condition: Target: Shallow Checkpoint Shelves (PD-L1, LAG-3, TIM-3), Architecture: Beta-Hairpin/Sheet
locked_doctrines.rationale: Beta-hairpins lack axial standoff. Lateral entry into the shelf causes systematic shoulder collisions and entropic collapse. Planar topologies cannot replace helical needles in this manifold.

locked_doctrines.title: Axial Standoff Minimum (PD-L1)
locked_doctrines.rationale: Clearance requires ≥5 prolines in the hinge. Designs below this threshold systematically violate steric exclusion under static audit. Scope: Needle class only.

locked_doctrines.title: PD-L1 Proline Phase Resonance
locked_doctrines.rationale: Discrete clearance phase transition observed uniquely at 8 prolines.

locked_doctrines.title: TIM-3 Needle Incompatibility
locked_doctrines.rationale: Exhaustive hinge sweep failed clearance; topology incompatible.

locked_doctrines.title: Single-Rod Saturation Limit
locked_doctrines.rationale: Energy saturates at -31,000 ±500 kJ/mol; further axial tuning is compute waste.

locked_doctrines.title: Metastable Basin Bifurcation
locked_doctrines.rationale: Fold-time basin selection dominates clearance; multiple near-degenerate basins exist.

locked_doctrines.title: Axial Collapse Dominance
locked_doctrines.rationale: Collinear mass reinforces rotational collapse torque instead of preventing it.

locked_doctrines.title: Forensic Triangulation
locked_doctrines.rationale: Cross-model disagreement (Chai / AF / RF) required to expose inductive bias ghost spots.

_audit_note: LAW-133 added: High-entropy tethers facilitate manifold collapse.
provisional_notes: TIM-3 currently exceeds the rigidity envelope of the 10-mer Needle instance. Geometry mismatch remains under investigation.
